thoughts.text: I should use the list_files command to list the files in the current directory.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the list_files command will allow me to see what files are in the current directory and ensure that the file I just created is present.
thoughts.plan: - Use the list_files command to list the files in the current directory.
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am in the correct directory and that I am not listing any sensitive information.
thoughts.speak: I just wrote a list of top European vacation destinations to a file. Should I use the list_files command to list the files in the current directory?
